Welcome to mchess’s documentation!¶

Contents:

  • ChessLink object
  • Chess link protocol helper functions
  • USB ChessLink transport
  • Bluetooth LE ChessLink transport
chess_link.ChessLink(appque, name) This implements the ‘Chess Link’ protocol for Millennium Chess Genius Exclusive and future boards compatible with that protocol.
chess_link_protocol Helper functions for the Chess Link protocol for character-based odd-parity and message-block-parity.
chess_link_usb.Transport(que) ChessLink transport implementation for USB connections.
chess_link_bluepy.Transport(que) ChessLink transport implementation for Bluetooth LE connections using bluepy.
